Adventure Guildsman: Just think of it! All of your wildest dreams of fame and fortune could come true! Our guild has the information you need! Your path to wealth may begin with something as trivial as delivering a letter, and could culminate in encounters with formidable beasts! You might even find romance along the way! The world is your oyster! So, tell me, what kind of adventure are you interested in?
